participant_1.name: Lila Harper
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, always seeking inspiration in nature.
participant_1.background: i grew up in the industry. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.

participant_2.name: Bella Cloud

participant_2.background: i am a little girl. i like to make time stop. i have superpowers. i live in the cloud. i'm very lonely.
